title: Toyota Kirloskar sales rise 14 pc in September
description: Toyota Kirloskar Motor reported a 14 per cent increase in wholesale units in September, with 26,847 units dispatched. Domestic sales stood at 23,802 and exports at 3,045 units. Festive season demand and strategic operational improvements, like the introduction of a third shift, have optimized the supply chain, reducing waiting periods for high-demand models.
